body:
Comment 7: 
Giving up, since the template package is being redone anyway and I would've had to add
formatters to get it 100% nice.

Plus I found Gary Burd's awesome service on App Engine:

     http://gopkgdoc.appspot.com/pkg/github.com/bradfitz/gomemcache

Instant docs.
_Status changed to **Retracted**._
